desc: Please check my personal Instagram feed: cabincrewtrainer. Do you believe you can increase engagement by liking the right photos and commenting on the right posts on Instagram? Can you get me true followers without deleting my own friends and without playing the follow unfollow game? A big thumbs down for Instagram accounts how follow less than 1 third of the number of their own followers. My goal is reaching 10k followers in 10 months. Simultaneously, I will send you a quality photo once every 14 days for you to post on the best time to get the best engagement including the best hashtags. These are my own hashtags: cabincrewtrainer luchtvaartdienstverlening seeyalateraviator jumpandslide and fittofly. Be free, be creative. Are you able to use Instagrams algorithm for the best? Once my personal Instagram feed has reached 10.000 true dedicated followers I will switch to a business profile. When we have a match you can be sure to become my dedicated VA for future endavours as well. This involves: Wordpress website development SEO tasks Online research for selling options But first, I want to reach every young woman around the world already flying as cabin crew or who are in training. And younger girls with a dream to become a flight attendant. Therefor, it is very important that you appeal to my niche. You...: are better in English than me, (Removed by [url removed, login to view] admin) are a young female that can relate to my target audience just like Gwyneth Paltrow in the 2003 movie View from the top, can relief me from administrative excel tasks, are skilled in online research, can work accurately in setting up an online photo, video, presentation and document library by renaming and tagging files and deleting duplicates in my dropbox and onedrive account appropiately for easy immediate retrieval during my classes, have a big plus when you hold a passion for aviation, travel and education, are curious, openminded, creative and fun by nature. check out my own creativity by watching my homemade video on YouTube my searching for easyJet timelapse Schiphol to Edinburgh have great cultural awareness, strive for a perfect work-life balance My offer a 1 month trial for follower growth 1000 followers = Euro 35, 1500 followers = Euro 80, 2500 followers = Euro 100. If after the trial my account will have less than 100 unfollowers in a month you will receive a 75 euro bonus..
